cards.title: An expert team of cardiologists
cards.text: A full team experts convene weekly to comprehensively evaluate each case to ensure the best possible outcomes. The team includes: interventional cardiologists, cardiac surgeons, electrophysiologists and imaging specialists.

cards.title: Area's leading TAVR expertise
cards.text: Our teams have performed over 500 Transcatheter Aortic Valve Replacements (TAVR), making us one of the most experienced in the Midwest. The hybrid operating room ensures a high degree of precision and unmatched consistency.
cards.CTA: Click here to read about our 500th TAVR procedure
